com.anji.neat

Class SpeciationStrategyKMeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anji.neat.SpeciationStrategyKMeans
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpeciationStrategy

    public class SpeciationStrategyKMeans
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpeciationStrategy
    Implements speciation using k-means clustering, as described in https://sites.google.com/site/sharpneat/speciation/speciation-by-k-means-clustering This code was adapted from SharpNEAT by Colin Green (see http://sharpneat.sourceforge.net/).

    • Method Detail

      • respeciate

        public void respeciate(java.util.List<Chromosome> genomeList,
              java.util.List<Species> speciesList,
              Genotype genotype)
        Description copied from interface: SpeciationStrategy
        Speciates the genomes in genomeList into the provided species, starting from scratch.
        Specified by:
        respeciate in interface SpeciationStrategy
        Parameters:
        genomeList - The list of genomes to speciate, must contain all genomes (including those that are already members of species in specieList.
        speciesList - A list of species, which may be empty.
        genotype - The Genotype object performing evolution, speciation parameters may be obtained with genotype.Genotype.getConfiguration().Configuration.getSpeciationParms().

      • speciate

        public void speciate(java.util.List<Chromosome> genomeList,
            java.util.List<Species> speciesList,
            Genotype genotype)
        Description copied from interface: SpeciationStrategy
        Speciates the genomes in genomeList into the provided species. Species may be added or removed, depending on the implementation.
        Specified by:
        speciate in interface SpeciationStrategy
        Parameters:
        genomeList - The list of genomes to speciate, must contain all genomes (including those that are already members of species in specieList.
        speciesList - A list of species, which may be empty.
        genotype - The Genotype object performing evolution, speciation parameters may be obtained with genotype.Genotype.getConfiguration().Configuration.getSpeciationParms().
